item.description:
[b]"THE BEST IN SLOW DATING. ONE FUN NIGHT, 20 GREAT DATES."

WEDNESDAY evening, MAY 26. X & O RESTAURANT, 217 Washington St., Rte. 138, Stoughton. (781)283-5900.
6:30-9:30 PM. For single professionals 40-60 years old.
Cost of $45 includes a complete 5-course dinner, tax, and tip. Each attendee receives 2 VIP GUEST PASSES worth $24.
Reservations required by calling (781)283-5900.
Proper dress required; ties & jackets strongly recommended.
Seating limited to 20 men & 20 women. Cocktail party, 6:30-7.
Each guest changes seats after every course to insure personally meeting each person of the opposite sex.
www.se-4u.com.
Everyone encouraged to swap business cards.
item.how_to_find_us: Ask for Pam at the door.
item.name: NEW**NEW** "SINGLES DINING OUT"
